name: AuraFarmingBoatKid
description:
AuraFarmingBoatKid (AFBK) — AuraFarmingBoatKid (AFBK) is a BEP-20 token engineered for decentralized ecosystems with a strong focus on sustainable farming, liquidity incentives, and gamified reward mechanisms.

Built on the Binance Smart Chain, AFBK is fully compatible with DeFi protocols and DEX infrastructure, enabling seamless integration into farming pools, staking platforms, and decentralized exchanges.

The token is designed to support real-time utility through a dual-layer farming engine and smart contract architecture that ensures capital efficiency and low gas interaction.

Key Features:
• Sustainable tokenomics with emission control
• LP staking and yield farming
• Modular governance compatibility (DAO-ready)
• Designed for Web3 wallets, DApps, and aggregator platforms

AFBK is not just a token — it’s an infrastructure element for building scalable and community-driven DeFi applications.
